title: Sri Lankaâ€™s new government pledges review of Adani wind project
description: Sri Lanka's new government intends to review a wind power deal with the Adani Group, following President Anura Kumara Dissanayake's campaign pledge to reassess it. The prices approved by the previous administration are under scrutiny, with major decisions postponed until after the parliamentary elections on Nov. 14.
